member.name: F:Blyzer.Domain.Enums.DeadBallType.BallsNotThrown
member.summary: Balls Not Thrown (the athlete elect not to throw)

member.name: F:Blyzer.Domain.Enums.ShotType.FirstBall
member.summary: First ball delivered after the jack

member.name: F:Blyzer.Domain.Enums.ShotType.Placement
member.summary: A shot played to deliver a ball in a specific area

member.name: F:Blyzer.Domain.Enums.ShotType.PushOn
member.summary: A shot in which the player pushes own ball closer into a target area e.g. jack ball or scoring space

member.name: F:Blyzer.Domain.Enums.ShotType.PushOff
member.summary: A shot in which the player pushes opposition ball away from the specific target

member.name: F:Blyzer.Domain.Enums.ShotType.Smash
member.summary: Predominently power shot along the ground

member.name: F:Blyzer.Domain.Enums.ShotType.Ricochet
member.summary: A shot played to rebound off a ball into a scoring zone

member.name: F:Blyzer.Domain.Enums.ShotType.BounceOver
member.summary: An aerial trajectory shot aimed at bouncing over a barrier ball to reach a specific target

member.name: F:Blyzer.Domain.Enums.ShotType.RollOnTop
member.summary: A shot with the intention of playing the ball and it remaining on top of another ball

member.name: F:Blyzer.Domain.Enums.ShotType.RollUpAndOver
member.summary: A shot with the intention of the ball rolling up and over

member.name: F:Blyzer.Domain.Enums.ShotType.LobbingShot
member.summary: An aerial shot played to move a target ball by attacking over a ball

member.name: T:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityLockout
member.summary: Gets or sets the LockoutOptions for the identity system.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityLockout.DefaultLockoutTimeSpan
member.summary: Gets or sets the TimeSpan a user is locked out for when a lockout occurs. Defaults to 5 minutes.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityLockout.MaxFailedAccessAttempts
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of failed access attempts allowed before a user is locked out, assuming lock out is enabled. Defaults to 5.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityLockout.AllowedForNewUsers
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether a new user can be locked out. Defaults to true.

member.name: T:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityOption
member.summary: Represents all the options you can use to configure the identity system.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityOption.Lockout
member.summary: Gets or sets the LockoutOptions for the identity system.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityOption.User
member.summary: Gets or sets the UserOptions for the identity system.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityOption.SignIn
member.summary: Gets or sets the SignInOptions for the identity system.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityPassword.RequireDigit
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating if passwords must contain a digit. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityPassword.RequiredLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum length a password must be. Defaults to 6.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityPassword.RequireLowercase
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating if passwords must contain a lower case ASCII character. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityPassword.RequireNonAlphanumeric
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating if passwords must contain a non-alphanumeric character. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityPassword.RequiredUniqueChars
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum number of unique chars a password must comprised of. Defaults to 1.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityPassword.RequireUppercase
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating if passwords must contain a upper case ASCII character. Defaults to true.

member.name: T:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentitySignIn
member.summary: Gets or sets the SignInOptions for the identity system.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentitySignIn.RequireConfirmedEmail
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether a confirmed email address is required to sign in. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentitySignIn.RequireConfirmedPhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether a confirmed telephone number is required to sign in. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityUser
member.summary: Gets or sets the UserOptions for the identity system.

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityUser.AllowedUserNameCharacters
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of allowed characters in the username used to validate user names. Defaults to abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789-._@+

member.name: P:Blyzer.Domain.Models.AppIdentityUser.RequireUniqueEmail
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether the application requires unique emails for its users. Defaults to false.
